description: Shearling style, high pile fleece hoody made with Polartec® fabric, updated this season with a refined fit. With its cosy hood and deep pockets, it's ideal for throwing on by the campfire or for an extra boost of heat on cold days outdoors. <br><br>Ideal as a cozy layer for cold days outdoors or for throwing on by the campfire, this shearling-style hoody is made with high pile, Polartec® fleece fabric for beating the chill on your everyday adventures. The casual fit with stretch hem and cuffs is as perfect for layering up for extra warmth as it is for post-climb trips to the pub. With a relaxed hood for added comfort, and deep zipped pockets for plunging your hands into on brisk winter walks.
name: Shearling Hoody - Womens
